title: What is the procedure to get seat in ANDHRA UNIVERSITY? - Quora

response.answer_text: Getting a seat in AU depends on the type of degree you choose. AU provides various options like B.A,M.A,MBBS,BPHARMACY,BSc,MSc,BEd,MBA and many other vocational courses. Below im listing the exam name and the degree you can study once you are qualified in that exam. EAMCET- provides entrance to B.A, BPHARMACY and MBBS courses. AUCET- provides admission to candidates in postgraduate courses offered under the streams of Science, Commerce, Humanities, Management, Teaching, and Mass Communication. EDCET- is for BEd (two years) programee course. ICET - provides admission into MBA and MCA courses. AUEET - provides degree in BTEch as a 6 year integrated course. For any other vocational or for any other courses you can contact AU SCHOOL OF DISTANCE EDUCATION or AU REGISTRATION OFFICE. Hope this finds useful to you

Through eamcet or through aucet you can get seat for btech course.For Msc,every year AU will publish notification for admission in Msc program during the month of may.The admission into various m Resources and Information. courses is through Andhra University Common Entrance Test (AUCET)conducted every year in the month of May.
